name: Insomnia (itch) (biszkopcikowo)
description:
Insomnia is a Singleplayer RPG that focuses on story rather than combat. Despite this, gameplay is still present as puzzles or action-based parts of the game.

You are Nara, a tired girl that has two friends, unlike her, both excited to play and do new and interesting things. Find out the secrets of their home and why Nara is sad by exploring her dreams and overcoming new obstacles.

Insomnia has 1-4 hours of playtime, most of which is text and exploration. Game made in RPG Maker MV.
